TestCaseMetaData.name: Parent child(FRN) Header
TestCaseMetaData.Description: The LIS system creates and delivers an electronic lab result message to the EHR-S. This test plan is designed to test the systems' capability to process reflex test reports which use the parent/child reporting structure.
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: Patient information is pre-loaded in the EHR-S. No other Pre-Condition.
TestCaseMetaData.PostCondition: The test message information received by the EHR-S has been incorporated with the patient's record.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate ability to import and incorporate a reflex result message when the filler order number does not uniquely identifies the test ordered. (FRN profiles).
